channel.title: How-To's on Open-Filament
channel.description: Recent content in How-To's on Open-Filament

item.title: Contribute
item.description: When you want to contribute, visit GitHub first. New producers Each producer will be saved under data/ folder as YAML file. Feel free to create a pull request on GitHub to extend the number of producers. See example.yml producer: name: example producer materials: PLA+: filaments: PLAPlus Filament: color: "#FF0000" PETG: filaments: 3D Filament - PETG:

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Find your filament Goto Producers and select your producer, material and the filament by name. At the moment we don’t offer different colors. Maybe we will extend the filament selection sometimes by a color palette. Each filament can be accesed by a shorter link, this link is used for QR-Code generation. When you miss one of your producers or materials or filaments, see the contribute page for more information. Download .
